p:
Grade 3-4 hematologic toxicities observed with the RiBVD regimen (51% neutropenia and 35% thrombocytopenia) were in line with those seen in patients treated with other regimens such as R-CHOP (60% neutropenia and 18% thrombocytopenia), VR-CAP (85% and 57%, respectively) or R-BAC (rituximab, bendamustine and cytarabine; 49% and 52%, respectively).
